newsitem.title: SPAIN: BASKETBALL-BARCELONA BEAT PANATHINAIKOS IN EUROLEAGUE.
newsitem.headline: BASKETBALL-BARCELONA BEAT PANATHINAIKOS IN EUROLEAGUE.

text.p: Result of a men's EuroLeague basketball championship group C match on Wednesday:
Barcelona - Rafael Jofresa (18) Andres Jimenez (12) Xavi Fernandez (11) Andrei Festissov (11)
Panathinaikos - Frangiskos Alvertis (13) Nikolaos Ekonomou (9) Byron Dinkins (9) Hugo Sconochini (9).
